homeInnerContentTitle: GGenius — a platform for MLBB players in Ukraine
homeInnerContentSub: Our platform helps Mobile Legends: Bang Bang players find a team, participate in tournaments, improve their game, and manage their profile — all through a convenient Telegram bot.
whatinnerSub: GGenius is a Telegram platform for MLBB players that combines everything you need for team play, competition, and skill development in one bot. Here you can:
whatinnerListItemSub1: GGenius helps you quickly find teammates to play with. Choose by age, role, play style, or language, and form a team for rankings and tournaments.
whatinnerListItemSub2: The platform offers tournaments of various formats, from local to amateur leagues. Choose one, register in a few clicks, and follow all the details on Telegram.
whatinnerListItemSub3: Want to host your own tournament? GGenius provides all the tools you need to organize it, from brackets to results and notifications.
whatinnerListItemSub4: AI analyzes your MLBB stats and gives personalized advice to improve your gameplay and rank.
workInnerSub: Everything happens right in Telegram — a convenient and intuitive way to access the team, tournaments, and progress.
workInnerListItemSubStart: Open GGenius in Telegram. Register via the bot.
workInnerListItemSubNext: Fill in your profile (rank, role, etc.)
progressInnerMapListItemSub1: Player database and teammate search (already available / in progress)
progressInnerMapListItemSub2: Module for creating and conducting tournaments
progressInnerMapListItemSub3: AI analytics (profile analysis, game tips, statistics)
partnersInnerContSub: The platform offers a variety of tournaments, from small local ones to large amateur leagues. Choose the format, review the rules, and register in just a few clicks. All the details — dates, lineups, brackets, and results — are collected directly in Telegram for maximum convenience.
errorPageInnerContSub: It appears that the page does not exist. Please go back and try again.
